alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 8:55PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Erie County through 945 PM EDT... At 855 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Girard, or 8 miles southwest of Erie, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Erie, Girard, Waterford, Northwest Harborcreek, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, McKean, Northwest Harborcr and Avonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
